title: Youtube'da sadece Firefox'ta yaşadığım bant genişliği problemi
content: Merhabalar.Sorunu başlıkta olduğu gibi yazdım.76mbit pakete geçiş yaptığımda bu durum net bir şekilde ortaya çıktı.Firefox Youtube videolarında mevcut internetin bant genişliğini hakkıyla kullanamadığını,diğer tarayıcıların ise böyle bir sorundan muzdarip olmadıklarını,bunun aksine maksimum gücü çekmeye çalıştıklarını gördüm. Firefox'a çok alıştım ancak günümün önemli bir kısmı Youtube'da geçtiği için bu durum benim için problem oluşturmakta.Önerileriniz nelerdir?
creator: dabbe_samet_

title: Firefox needs a much better profile management system
content:
The feedback page is useless and I don't see any way to contact Mozilla so this will probably go unviewed and be more of a rant but Firefox absolutely needs a much better profile management and back system. Particularly there should be a mandatory step to backup a current profile before updating. Today I updated Firefox not by choice, for some reason my PC decided that a single click was a double click. So the latest version created a brand new profile I assume because I already had Firefox open. I am beyond rage right now because I just spent the last half hour trying to find my correct profile in my user data because for some insane reason Firefox decided to create two new profiles.

I manually backed up my profile data but it's incredibly stupid that A) the profile naming is gibberish and B) I had to do that in the first place.8
creator: njdev

title: Infinite scroll and Unnecessary Horizontal scroll
content:
Windows 10 Pro 20H2, Firefox 91.0.1

In a specific webpage, Horizontal scrollbar shows up and extends or shrink how I move my cursor. On the infinite scroll, As long as I keep moving my cursor, The page goes forever. It supposed to end.

I've tried it with Safe mode and no change. Same behavior. Other browsers are working fine.

I'm not sure if this is a page specific issue or not. Most webpages are fine except for that. Here's the page source in case you need to test:

view-source:https://angusnicneven.com/Gate_Information
creator: gumballslime

title: Recovering Past Projects From Thimble
content: Good evening. I was direct messaging you all in order to gain some insight on old Thimble projects. I've recently started college, I've been learning Python, and I've already started helping those, with other majors specifically business, who need assistance with creating websites using HTML. Assisting these students would be even more accomplishable if I had these past projects. Unfortunately, I don’t remember being informed about the shutting down of Thimble. Therefore, I wasn’t able to export my past projects to Glitch such as many other users. I’ve already created two Glitch accounts in order to see if it’s still possible to transfer information, but you all seem to have no form of direct customer service contact. Additionally, I've sent sent an email and direct message to Mozilla but received no response. I've been trying to recover my projects for the past two days and a while ago, so it would be greatly appreciated if I can please still recover my past projects! Thanks!
creator: tmmoore1210

title: tabs and searching
content:
After searching in the browser bar, and then getting results, i click on hyperlinks from the results and new tabs open. I explore the subsequent open tabs, and then at some point, the search functions quit working in all tabs, and i need to restart firefox to correct the issue (searching in the main browser bar ).

If i type an actual address - it will sometimes "clear the glitch" and the "searching in the broswer bar" may start working again...

Any ideas why the search function would not respond from time to time?
creator: buchan.brent

title: Website appearance and style display bug
content:
